about-me-present.name: Student at Northeastern Univeristy
about-me-present.description: I'm currently a candidate for a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Northeastern Univeristy College of Computer and Information Science. I plan to graduate in June, 2017.

about-me-past.name:
Swoop: Software Enginnering Co-op
January-June 2016
about-me-past.description: I had my second co-op at Swoop Inc.

about-me-past.name:
Vice President of HackBeanpot Inc.
May 2015-April 2016
about-me-past.description: I attended HackBeanpot 2015 as a volunteer, and then joined the team as the Vice President in 2016. I helped the team get sh*t done by managing the meeting agendas, sending out emails, keeping track of meetings, and  sending more and more frequent messages as deadlines approach.

about-me-past.name:
Vice President of the Northeastern University Women in Technology club
May 2015-April 2016
about-me-past.description: I have recieved so much support to pursue my love of computing and technology, and I want to make sure that everyone can have that opprotunity. With the Women in Technology club, I work to make sure that there is a safe space to celebrate the women at Northeastern who are as excited about technology as I am.

about-me-past.name:
Hubspot: Software Enginnering Co-op
January-June 2015
about-me-past.description: I worked at Hubspot as a software engineering co-op. I learned a lot about front-end web development, using javascript, coffeescript, jade, handlebars, CSS, and SASS.

about-me-past.name:
Castilleja High School
2006-2013
about-me-past.description: From 6-12th grade, I attended Castilleja School. The motto 'Women Learning Women Leading' has stuck with me as I continue my life 3000 miles away. I have never believed that I am less qualified or smart than my male peers, and I never will.
